newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle very slow $66 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle very slow $66 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was very slow in the Panhandle on Thursday, USDA said.

Slaughter steers and heifers were not well tested. Feedlots reporting light inquiry from buyers. Sales reported on 100 slaughter steers and 300 heifers; 64,000 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 13,700 formulated and 1,300 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Pen Select and Choice 2-3 1150 lbs 66.00.
Slaughter Heifers - Pen Select and Choice 2-3 1050 lbs 66.00.
Wk to Date - 64,000 Week Ago - 87,800 Year Ago - 99,600
